name: Thirst For Travel
details: Thirst For Travel MERN Stack website build with React.js along with CRUD and Dashboard functionalities. Google Firebase has been used for user authentication and hosting. For database i have use MongoDB here. Node.js is used in backend.
technology: nodejs javaScript mongodb reactjs axios firebase-auth react-hook-form bootstrap5 css3 google-auth
